channel.title: Planet of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the planet of the day.

item.title: TOI-1452 b
item.description: TOI-1452 b is a confirmed super-Earth exoplanet, possibly a water world, orbiting a red-dwarf star TOI-1452 about 100 light-years away in the Draco constellation. The exoplanet is about 70% larger in diameter than Earth, and roughly five times as massive.
